think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the random_page_cost knob in PostgreSQL, which is used to estimate the cost of random disk page accesses. 2. Determine if this knob has any special values that alter its behavior significantly. 3. Check if the knob can take values like -1 or 0 that would disable its regular functionality. 4. Conclude whether the knob behaves differently when set to such special values compared to its typical numerical range.
